metadata.title: CVE-2024-24784 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The ParseAddressList function incorrectly handles comments (text withinparentheses) within display names. Since this is a misalignment withconforming address parsers, it can result in different trust decisionsbeing made by programs using different parsers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24784` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.21 - 1.21.1-1~ubuntu20.04.3
golang-1.21-go - 1.21.1-1~ubuntu20.04.3
golang-1.21-src - 1.21.1-1~ubuntu20.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
